title: County ordinances
context: [ยง132D-17.5] County ordinances. (a) Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to supersede or in any manner affect a county fireworks ordinance; provided that the ordinance is at least as stringent in the control or prohibition of fireworks as the law under this chapter. (b) Nothing in this chapter shall prohibit a county from enacting ordinances that are more stringent in the control or prohibition of fireworks than this chapter. [L 2010, c 170, ยง1] Case Notes Honolulu city ordinance prohibiting the importation of consumer fireworks into Honolulu was an ordinance that was &ldquo;more stringent in the control or prohibition of fireworks&rdquo; enacted within the city&rsquo;s power granted under this chapter. 796 F. Supp. 2d 1261 (2011).
